utterance: <speak>The area we will choose is physical and chemical changes. Click on the highlighted picture below.</speak>
<speak>Within the area of physical and chemical changes, we will select the topic crystal growth. Please click the highlighted picture below.</speak>
<speak>Below are some variables that might affect the amount of crystal growth on a string in water.  We can test one of these variables in the experiment</speak>
<speak>The water temperature, the type of crystals, the initial amount of crystals on the string and the type of string</speak>
<speak>Here are all of the materials that may be necessary for this experiment, a glass jar, a calendar, a pencil, string, distilled water, crystals and a digital scale.</speak>
<speak>We will mix a crystal salt or sugar in water so it dissolves</speak>
<speak>We will continue to add the crystals and mix until no more crystals can be dissolved in the water, this is the saturation point</speak>
<speak>Then we will put a string in the water. We can measure the weight of the crystal growth after two weeks.</speak>
<speak>Push the button in the middle of the screen to see how this experiment works</speak>

<speak>In this experiment, there are only four things we can change, any of these might make a difference in the amount of crystal growth on a string in water, these are the four variables we can test in this experiment, the water temperature which can be cool</speak>
<speak>The type of crystal which can be salt</speak>
<speak>Or brown sugar might make a difference</speak>
<speak>The initial amount of crystals on the string which can be none</speak>
<speak>And the type of string which can be twine</speak>
<speak>Or yarn, this might also make a difference</speak>
<speak>We will test the following variable. The type of crystals on the string. This is the indepedent variable of the experiment. Please click on the highlighted button below.</speak>
<speak>Our research question is: does the type of crystal affect the weight of the crystal growth on a string in water after two weeks?</speak>
<speak>OK!, we have chosen the following research Question, does the type of crystal affect the weight of the crystal growth on a string in water after two weeks?</speak>
